title: Nepal Ayurveda Home en Katmandú - Hotels.com
description: View deals for Nepal Ayurveda Home. Asan Tole is minutes away. Breakfast, WiFi, and parking are free at this hotel. All rooms have daily housekeeping and air conditioning.
